item.title: JNJ
item.description: score:18 Chances: This company is currently firing on all cylinders. Most readers would already know that Johnson & Johnson’s (NYSE:JNJ) stock increased by 6.8% over the past three months. These stocks may help you win in 2024 – no matter what the market does.
